titleStmt.title: Description of An Arabic translation of the Former and Latter Prophets, with commentaries.

availability.licence: This metadata, accompanying images, and the content of London, British Library, Oriental Manuscripts Or 5434: An Arabic translation of the Former and Latter Prophets, with commentaries. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Damp at head and gutter. Losses to damp and mould at ends, repaired and infilled.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: An Arabic translation of the Former and Latter Prophets, with commentaries.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental semi-cursive and square script of the 16th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Issachar b. Mordecai b. Susan. The Prophets. Arabic in Hebrew Character. Brit. Mus. Oriental 5434.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
S. Raffalovich: purchased by the British Museum from him in September 1899: inscribed, folio [237v] (fse002v).
